text: Javier Loayza Barea is a Bolivian diplomat. He has served as the Permanent Representative to the United Nations (UN Ambassador) of Bolivia. He served as President of the UNICEF Executive Board at the international level in 2007.Officers of the UNICEF Executive Board 1946–2014, UNICEFExecutive Board, UNICEF ==References== Category:Permanent Representatives of Bolivia to the United Nations Category:Chairmen and Presidents of UNICEF Category:Bolivian officials of the United Nations
title: Javier Loayza Barea
